Sanity Commands.val: Notify-all will turn on all notifications including muted ones
Use notify-mute if you get too many notification pop-ups
If you just want to be notified when someone is chatting @ you

Room Commands.val: Command to bring up the create room dialog
To leave a room and drop out of the converstions
To be used by admins as a prefix with text to set room discussion topic
To be used by admin as a prefix with the username to remove a user

Message Commands.val: To convey a message to everyone
If you have been away and have a bunch of unread messages which you wish to ignore
Command to tidy up chat history
